title: [Inflection Award] Fully-Funded Opportunity for PhD students
author: 글로벌리더십센터 최여진
content:
Inflection a fully-funded awards programme selecting 30 exceptional PhD students worldwide working on climate solutions. We offer selected students the chance to attend an exclusive event in Paris, France (10th-11th March) where they will connect with global climate experts and industry leaders.
  Eligibility:
 Currently pursuing a PhD or graduated with a PhD within the last 12 months.
30 years old or younger at the time of application.
Conducting research with climate-relevant impact, in any field of study (this is not limited to climate science; we encourage applicants from a wide range of disciplines).
Motivated by an urgent desire to maximize your impact on the climate crisis.
Application Deadline: December 1, 2024
   The award, coordinated by Marble with support from Breakthrough Energy and the Quadrature Climate Foundation, features a panel of judges recognized in both academic and industry circles, ensuring a rigorous selection process.
  For more information and to apply visit: inflectionaward.com
